message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 13
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
From host country/other sources
13
JSPS (Japan)
o Competitive (as far as I know).
o Very good brochure in the lab.
Check Embassies!
Extra: if you want to visit a University but not to do a 
research stay, there are a lot of Summer Schools (specially
in China, partially funded).
Other sources:
o European projects.
o MC Actions.
o Projects with foreign universities at researcher level.
o Foreign universities need minions.
speaker: SYSTEM
